apps.localizedDescription:
This tweak makes Spotify think you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening and provides some additional features like custom lyrics.

Restrictions:
These features are server sided, and will never work.
• Very High audio quality
• Native playlist downloading
• Jam
• AI DJ/Playlist

Lyrics Support:
EeveeSpotify replaces Spotify monthly limited lyrics with one of the following three lyrics providers.
• Genius: Offers the best quality lyrics, provides the most songs, and updates lyrics the fastest. Isn't time-synced.
• LRCLIB: The most open service, offering time-synced lyrics. However, it lacks lyrics for many songs.
• Musixmatch: The service Spotify uses. Provides time-synced lyrics for many songs, but you'll need a user token to use this source. To obtain the token, download Musixmatch from the App Store, sign up, then go to Settings > Get help > Copy debug info, and paste it into the EeveeSpotify popup box.
• PetitLyrics: Offers plenty of time-synced Japanese and some international lyrics.

To open Spotify links in sideloaded app, use OpenSpotifySafariExtension. Remember to activate it and allow access in Settings > Safari > Extensions.
apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: A tweak to get Spotify Premium for free
